pr_title: pscanrules alpha/beta: Promote 'Modern Web Application' rule to Beta

timeline.bodyText: The ID of the add-on needs to be updated.
timeline.author: thc202
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -65,6 +65,12 @@

HTTPS to HTTP Insecure Transition in Form Post

Latest code: InsecureFormPostScanner.java +

Modern Web Application

+This raises an informational alert if a site appears to be a modern web application.
+It does not indicate any potential vulnerabilities but it could indicate that the ajax spider might be more effective at exploring this site compared to the traditional spider. +

+Latest code: ModernAppDetectionScanner.java

replies.bodyText: Oops got one and missed one
replies.author: kingthorin

timeline.message:
pscanrules alpha/beta: Promote 'Modern Web Application' rule to Beta

- Moved rule class.
- Moved unit test.
- Moved resource keys/values.
- Moved help entry.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
